TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object
public ref class Cursors abstract sealed

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此静态类定义了应用程序通用的一组默认游标。
定义游标的各种静态属性不能直接在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，而是通过两种可能的机制间接使用：
- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>类对采用类型的任何属性执行类型转换，以使 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> <xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType> 指定为特性值的枚举的值将计算为静态 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors> 属性之一。
- 静态属性值可通过 [X:Static 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension)来使用。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppStarting As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ AppStarting { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]
